data.title: Town of Riola Sardo ZIP 09070 (OR) Sardegna, Italy. Full data and useful information also on COVID
data.text:
Data about population living in Riola Sardo

NOTICE: in what follows data refers to Riola Sardo, where rises the City Hall of Riola Sardo, (and then not to the whole territory of Riola Sardo). For the sake of simplicity we will us the term of Riola Sardo.

In Riola Sardo live two thousand and thirty-three people: one thousand and twenty-eight are males and one thousand and five are females.

There are eight hundred and sixty-nine singles (four hundred and ninety-nine males and three hundred and seventy females). There are nine hundred and nineteen people married, and fourty-three people legally separed. There are also thirty-six divorced people and one hundred and sixty-six widows and widowers.

Please find in what follows the table of the distribution of inhabitants by age.

Data about foreigners living in Riola Sardo

In Riola Sardo live thirteen foreigners, five are males and eight are females. 11 come from Europa, 2 from Africa, 0 from America, 0 from Asia and 0 from Oceania.

Please find in what follows the table of the distribution of foreigners by age.

Education in Riola Sardo

There are in Riola Sardo one thousand, nine hundred and fifty-eight people in school age, nine hundred and ninety-one are males and nine hundred and sixty-seven females.

Employment rates and workers in Riola Sardo

There are in Riola Sardo 831 people aged 15 years or more. 666 are employed and 134 were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job. There are 502 males aged 15 years or more, 406 are employed and 80 were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job. There are 329 females aged 15 years or more, 260 are employed and 54 s were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job.

Families and their compositions

There are in Riola Sardo 827 families, for a total of 2033 people.

Please find in what follows a table showing the number of families along with the number of people for each family.

There are 827 famiglie living in Riola Sardo. 14 live in rented houses, 746 live in houses of their own property√Ç and 67 live in houses for different reasons.

The buildings and their characteristics in Riola Sardo

There are in Riola Sardo 1078 buildings, but only 986 are used. 920 buildings are for residential use, 66 buildings are for commercial or productive pourposes. Among the 920 buildings for residential use 844 were build using bricks of tuffs, 0 were built using concrete and 76 were built using other materials like steel, wood and so on. Among the 920 buildings for residential use 143 are in excellent condition, 602 are in good conditions, 171 are in mediocre conditions and 4 are in bad conditions.

In the following three tables the buildings built for residential use in Riola Sardo are classified by building year, by floors number and by rooms number.
